document_data.name: Greater Ironguard
document_data.mainbody: '''''Greater ironguard''''', or simply '''''ironguard''''',  was an [[arcane]] [[abjuration]] spell that temporarily granted one creature immunity from all non-magical metals and some enchanted metals. It was an  improved version of ''[[lesser ironguard]]''.
document_data.Effects: The effects of this spell were the same as for ''lesser ironguard'' except that it also granted immunity and transparency to metals that had been enchanted up to a certain degree.Up to and including ''+2'' weapons or the equivalent.
document_data.Components: In addition to the [[Verbal component|verbal]], [[Somatic component|somatic]], and [[material component]]s required for ''lesser ironguard'', this spell needed an arcane focus in the form of a small piece of raw [[adamantine]] costing about 100 [[gp]].
